summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 11.8°C) and outside temperature (down 11.6°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 12%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11496 lux) and cloud levels (up 376 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15796 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 261 m), and outside humidity (down 7%) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, the air will feel dry and gentle light winds are expected. Drizzle or light rain possible, overcast skies with low cloud, and weak sunlight because of clouds. Weather patterns to stay the same.
